title: Flowers
description:
Description :
        Ryou Nakamura moves in to his new life and apartment and spots two men kissing and he's too intrigued to look away. After getting into college, Ryou is finally learning to discover who he really is and who he really likes. We begin Miyamoto Kano's Flowers, filled with love triangles and coming-of-age tales today. From Hochuuami Also contains extra story "MIssing" From Baka-Updates: When Ryou moves into a new apartment block, his neighbour Makoto makes no secret of the fact that he likes men, and Ryou is forced to confront the secret doubts he's always had about his own sexuality. Things get complicated when Makoto's history with the other resident of the building, Nanno, results in jealousy, tension, and love triangles all around.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.0 Chapter 0 : Flowers Dj - Flower Children (Sequel)
